races.name: Covered By MansionBet Faller Insurance Novices' Hurdle (GBB Race)
races.verdict: The most interesting runner is YOUR DARLING, who won a good Newbury bumper pretty comfortably on his debut in January.

nags.name: Some Spin
nags.rp_comment: Shock winner on hurdle debut in Ireland but tailed off for new stable last month

nags.name: Perfect Myth
nags.rp_comment: Displayed significant improvement and won twice last month; obvious contender

nags.name: Ace Time
nags.rp_comment: Showed promise in AW bumpers last season but probably best watched on hurdle debut

nags.name: Daranova
nags.rp_comment: Clear second to odds-on winner at Warwick last month; each-way claims again here

nags.name: George Of Naunton
nags.rp_comment: Second bumper run was disappointing but the debut effort was encouraging; non-runner.

nags.name: Hydroplane
nags.rp_comment: Fairly useful on the Flat; second hurdle run was promising; back from break here

nags.name: Kemble's Cascade
nags.rp_comment: Placed in two of his three bumpers and ought to have a future over jumps

nags.name: King Erik
nags.rp_comment: Ran well for a long way when fifth in good maiden hurdle at Ludlow (2m5f) last season

nags.name: Mandocello
nags.rp_comment: Fair Flat-racer (1m2f winner); makes stable/hurdle debut after long absence

nags.name: Monarchofthegrange
nags.rp_comment: Settled better and displayed improvement when third at Fakenham in March; could have a say

nags.name: Prince Escalus
nags.rp_comment: Irish point winner; made low-key rules debut in Newbury bumper; should do better

nags.name: Rock On Tommy
nags.rp_comment: In good hands but was beaten about 32l when fifth on recent bumper debut

nags.name: Tigray
nags.rp_comment: Triple AW Flat winner; makes stable debut after eight-month absence; others stronger

nags.name: Your Darling
nags.rp_comment: Impressed in good Newbury bumper on debut; something amiss on second start; hurdle debut

nags.name: Delgany Dancer
nags.rp_comment: In good hands but made low-key bumper debut three weeks ago

nags.name: Telekinetic
nags.rp_comment: Low-grade Flat winner; just minor promise when well-held fourth on hurdle debut

races.name: Bet 10 Get 20 With MansionBet Mares' Maiden Hurdle (GBB Race)
races.verdict: 4yo PANIC ATTACK was seriously impressive when winning a Listed bumper on her debut and gets the nod ahead of Vegas Blue.

nags.name: All Right
nags.rp_comment: Low-grade Flat winner in summer 2019 but out of form in that sphere this season

nags.name: Connie Wilde
nags.rp_comment: Struggled in heavy-ground bumper on debut but has very good jumping pedigree

nags.name: Dammit Janet
nags.rp_comment: Reportedly finished fatigued when well beaten in a bumper in 2017; back from long absence

nags.name: Daraz Legacy
nags.rp_comment: Well-beaten outsider on both hurdle starts (2m1f/2m); makes no appeal

nags.name: Ginflix
nags.rp_comment: Won French AQPS Flat race in 2019 but well beaten on last month's hurdle debut

nags.name: Just A Sip
nags.rp_comment: Stoutly bred mare who displayed only minor promise on first two hurdle starts

nags.name: Karastani
nags.rp_comment: Made respectable hurdle debut at Newton Abbot last month but others look stronger here

nags.name: Keyboard Joan
nags.rp_comment: Second in two bumpers this summer, and last month's hurdle debut was very respectable

nags.name: Libby's Ray
nags.rp_comment: Half-sister to a fairly useful chaser; hooded on debut; best watched

nags.name: Panic Attack
nags.rp_comment: Very impressive when easily winning Listed bumper on debut in January

nags.name: Vegas Blue
nags.rp_comment: Disappointed on hurdle debut but won a Listed bumper here last season; big player

races.name: MansionBet Proud To Support British Racing Novices' Handicap Chase (GBB Race) (Div I)
races.verdict: A competitive race can go to PEUR DE RIEN who made a good impression when winning a lesser race on his recent chase debut

nags.name: Flight Deck
nags.rp_comment: Did well to win 2m4f handicap at Newbury in February (soft); up 7lb for chase debut

nags.name: Oscar Robertson
nags.rp_comment: Quite useful novice hurdle form at about this trip; interesting newcomer to fences

nags.name: New Quay
nags.rp_comment: Non-stayer back at 3m latest but squeak on best chase form at about this trip (soft/good)

nags.name: Dublin Four
nags.rp_comment: Hurdle runs on good to soft/slower; won 2m4f maiden in March; should make a chaser

nags.name: Special Acceptance
nags.rp_comment: Maiden over hurdles but often ran well in h'caps off similar marks; now goes chasing

nags.name: Captain Woodie
nags.rp_comment: Dual bumper winner; not live up to that promise over hurdles; had wind surgery

nags.name: Chesterfield King
nags.rp_comment: Good 2m hurdle form in early 2018; hard to gauge wellbeing in 3 runs since 2-year absence

nags.name: Guy
nags.rp_comment: Hurdle promise despite a couple of tough tasks at 2m5f/2m1f; handicap/chase debut

nags.name: Ebony Gale
nags.rp_comment: Bumper/hurdle winner in 2018; modest form in 2 starts last winter; chase debut

nags.name: Peur De Rien
nags.rp_comment: Won chase debut in good style last month (2m4f, good); up 8lb; may well do better

races.name: MansionBet Proud To Support British Racing Novices' Handicap Chase (GBB Race) (Div II)
races.verdict: Northern Bound has more to do than when winning at Warwick and perhaps DARSI IN THE PARK can make a winning start over fences

nags.name: Zoutoise
nags.rp_comment: Looked ready for step up in trip when winning 1m7f novice in March; handicap/chase debut

nags.name: Darsi In The Park
nags.rp_comment: Maiden hurdle winner who ran well in strong 2m5f handicap after; competitive now chasing

nags.name: Wynford
nags.rp_comment: Triple hurdle winner on good; minor Flat form these days; best watched now chasing

nags.name: Belargus
nags.rp_comment: Better chase effort when 3rd over 2m4f in December (soft); time still on his side

nags.name: Lough Har
nags.rp_comment: Strong form claims on his 2nd in July; made several mistakes before pulled up since

nags.name: Rootless Tree
nags.rp_comment: Bumper/novice hurdle winner; minor h'cap form in 2 of last 3 starts; chase debut; new yard

nags.name: Landin
nags.rp_comment: Latest of 3 hurdle wins was off 9lb higher in March 2018; off since Feb 2019; chase debut

nags.name: Northern Bound
nags.rp_comment: Tough task on chase debut but held on well to win at Warwick (2m4f, good); back up 6lb

nags.name: Champagne Noir
nags.rp_comment: Promise in Irish point/hurdle debut; modest h'cap debut; may do better at 2m4f now chasing

races.name: MansionBet Handicap Hurdle
races.verdict: 5yo FLOATING ROCK (nap) is arguably fortunate to have escaped from last month's novice win with just a 1lb nudge up the weights.

nags.name: Building Bridges
nags.rp_comment: Well beaten twice since promising handicap debut; blinkers now added; others safer

nags.name: Knockmaole Boy
nags.rp_comment: Pulled up when reverting to hurdles in August and very difficult to enthuse over

nags.name: Glutnforpunishment
nags.rp_comment: Took quite well to hurdling last summer but recent Flat form is underwhelming

nags.name: Floating Rock
nags.rp_comment: Came good in Fontwell novice last month; returns to a handicap on a workable mark; player

nags.name: First Quest
nags.rp_comment: Every chance when last-flight faller on stable debut last autumn; returns on same mark

nags.name: Dream Machine
nags.rp_comment: Sound effort when third at Stratford last time; player if aided by first-time cheekpieces

nags.name: Great Hall
nags.rp_comment: Well beaten on the Flat last month but well suited by this C&D over hurdles; considered

nags.name: Eye Of An Eagle
nags.rp_comment: Not at best last time but probably should have won two starts ago; handicap debut today

nags.name: Brambledown
nags.rp_comment: Runner-up in three juvenile hurdles last season; worth a glance in the betting after break

nags.name: Out On The Tear
nags.rp_comment: Dual hurdle winner last season; absent since March but could still have more to offer

nags.name: Takeit Easy
nags.rp_comment: In the frame all three hurdle starts; improvement needed here, but that's possible

nags.name: Durouyn
nags.rp_comment: Pulled up on handicap/chase debut in March; considered only if lively in the betting

nags.name: Spirit Of Waterloo
nags.rp_comment: Displayed promise on last two of three hurdle runs last season; makes handicap debut today

nags.name: Cristal Spirit
nags.rp_comment: Safely held in three handicaps since heavy-ground maiden win in January; others preferred

nags.name: Derek Duval
nags.rp_comment: Pulled up on slow ground in first two handicap hurdles; might fare better here

nags.name: Rukwa
nags.rp_comment: Not beaten that far last month but yet to build upon last summer's Cartmel maiden win

nags.name: Glimpse Of Gold
nags.rp_comment: In good form for new stable in recent weeks but new career best needed here

races.name: MansionBet Best Odds Guaranteed Handicap Chase
races.verdict: Doctor Haze has potential but providing THE LATE LEGEND doesn't find this coming too soon he can follow up his Sedgefield win

nags.name: Write It Down
nags.rp_comment: Won 2 of last 5 starts at around 2m4f; modest at 3m latest; still to prove this trip suits

nags.name: West Wizard
nags.rp_comment: Formerly useful at up to this trip but hasn't won for 2 years; French form mixed of late

nags.name: Out For Justice
nags.rp_comment: Won two chases at 3m/2m5f in first half of 2019; not out of this back from break

nags.name: Doctor Haze
nags.rp_comment: Jumping not foolproof over fences but has a race in him on his Stratford 2nd in August

nags.name: Alexander The Grey
nags.rp_comment: Off the mark when 3m winner last October; mostly unconvincing since, including latest

nags.name: Fr Humphrey
nags.rp_comment: Good run of form at up to 2m7f from late August 2019; slowly working his way back to form

nags.name: Easter Eric
nags.rp_comment: Fairly encouraging fifth in Fakenham handicap hurdle in March; modest chase debut since

nags.name: Cybalko
nags.rp_comment: Not badly handicapped on old chase form; below best of late; new trip looks an experiment

nags.name: Blackwood Rover
nags.rp_comment: Triple winning pointer; wellbeing to prove under rules  back with former trainer

nags.name: The Late Legend
nags.rp_comment: Wide-margin 3m2f win at Sedgefield shows he is going the right way; good form chance

nags.name: Torrent Des Mottes
nags.rp_comment: Improved to win over 2m4f here in March (tongue-tie discarded); trip query back at 3m

nags.name: Moroval
nags.rp_comment: Limited chase promise in Ireland and modest staying handicap hurdle form last winter

races.name: Download The MansionBet App Handicap Hurdle
races.verdict: The suggestion is LINENHALL, who didn't run badly in a chase on his latest start in February and is well handicapped over hurdles.

nags.name: Sandy Boy
nags.rp_comment: Quite well handicapped on last autumn's form but seems to have lost his way

nags.name: Wasdell Dundalk
nags.rp_comment: Upped significantly in trip after staying-on fourth over 2m1f on handicap debut

nags.name: Nobel Joshua
nags.rp_comment: Sold out of Gordon Elliott stable for £6,000 after last month's  win; should go well again

nags.name: Crystal Lad
nags.rp_comment: C&D winner off much-reduced mark last month; still very well treated on old form

nags.name: Linenhall
nags.rp_comment: Lightly raced in recent years; reverts to hurdling on very attractive mark

nags.name: Bletchley Castle
nags.rp_comment: Habitual front-runner; better known as a chaser now; pulled up on latest run in February

nags.name: Cyclop
nags.rp_comment: Better known as a staying chaser; makes stable debut from workable hurdle mark

nags.name: Somekindofstar
nags.rp_comment: Faded out of contention in first two handicaps; subsequent wind op might have helped

nags.name: Innisfree Lad
nags.rp_comment: Has changed stables since two below-par chase runs in early 2010; well handicapped

nags.name: Hot To Trot
nags.rp_comment: Dual point winner; going okay before fall on handicap debut; still unexposed under rules

nags.name: Oldabbey Bridge
nags.rp_comment: In good form over 2m4f this season; on the premises again if stamina holds out

nags.name: Always Able
nags.rp_comment: Beaten about 41l on recent seasonal/handicap debut; others have more pressing claims

races.name: MansionBet Maiden National Hunt Flat Race (Conditional Jockeys' And Amateur Riders' Race) (GBB Race)
races.verdict: The standard is set by GUMBO FLYER, who was nicely clear of the third when second over C&D on his debut in March.

nags.name: Big G
nags.rp_comment: Safely held at Chepstow in November but debut run at Stratford was promising; stable debut

nags.name: Full Spes
nags.rp_comment: Made the frame on both starts last season but needs to improve to win here

nags.name: Gumbo Flyer
nags.rp_comment: Made promising debut when clear second over C&D (soft) in March; high on the list

nags.name: Hey Joe
nags.rp_comment: No match for winner when second at Newton Abbot last month; probably needs more here

nags.name: Highwayman Vic
nags.rp_comment: Well-beaten 50-1 shot on debut at Market Rasen (good) in August; blinkers now added

nags.name: Irolin Jack
nags.rp_comment: Well down the field when 40-1 for debut at Newbury; this race looks easier

nags.name: Presentedwithwings
nags.rp_comment: Displayed promise on both starts in spring 2018; back from long absence here

nags.name: Sandinista
nags.rp_comment: Brother to stable's bumper/smart jumps winner Claret Cloak; yard does well in bumpers

nags.name: Teenage Dirtbag
nags.rp_comment: Sent off at only 13-2 for recent debut at Plumpton but struggled there

nags.name: Travelling Max
nags.rp_comment: Beaten about 42l on debut at Uttoxeter; tongue-tie now added

nags.name: Will Sting
nags.rp_comment: Beaten about 28l after setting steady pace at Southwell last October; now hooded

nags.name: Tranquil Dawn
nags.rp_comment: Struggled (albeit on heavy ground) when 50-1 for rules debut in February
